oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of enzyme-aided juice production on the extractability and profile of berry anthocyanins
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koponen, Jani M.
Buchert, Johanna
Poutanen, Kaisa S.
Törrönen, A. Riitta
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Processing, packaging and transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These experiments showed that the anthocyanin yield increased significantly in certain enzyme-aided treatments as compared to control.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Koponen, Jani M.; Buchert, Johanna; Poutanen, Kaisa S. and Törrönen, A. Riitta (2007) Effect of enzyme-aided juice production on the extractability and profile of berry anthocyanins. Paper at: Beneficial health substances from berries and minor crops - how to increase their concentration in cultivated species, eliminate losses in processing and enhance dietary use : NJF seminar 399, Piikkiö, Finland, 14-15 March 2007.
